import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { InternshipStatusAsString } from 'src/app/features/internship-management/core/enums/internship-status'; import { Internship } from 'src/app/features/internship-management/core/models/internship'; @Component({ selector: 'app-internships-table', templateUrl: './internships-table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./internships-table.component.scss'] }) export class InternshipsTableComponent { @Input() internships: Internship[] | undefined; status = InternshipStatusAsString; }
Topic Status Scheduled To Start On Scheduled To End On Enrolled Interns Maximum Allowd To Enroll Duration
Software Development
{{ internship.status }}
